lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone should have a chance to make a better life for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a homeschooling parent to 2 teenagers. I believe in teaching my children more about the world than what the public school system teachs them.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.occupation: Director of Publications and Media Relations
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance is one of the best ways to eliminate poverty throughout the world.

lenders.name: Avinash_Lajja
lenders.loan_because: I consider myself fortunate to have ability to make a micro contribution towards someone, who is doing all the hardwork and putting in all the efforts to meet their necessity .
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a Hardware Engineer, residing in Silicon Vally "Mecca of Entrepreneur"

I am a young entrepreneur myself and I understand the value of funds to make your dream a reality.

lenders.name: Emily

lenders.occupational_info: I teach in a medical school.  We have amazing students that want to go out and help people.

lenders.name: Kellen
lenders.loan_because: i care

lenders.name: Russell
lenders.loan_because: It's only right...I'm a lucky guy and I don't need more than what's required to live comfortably.
lenders.occupational_info: The way it should be for everybody who has more than what they need.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: all of us have needed a hand at one point or another in our lives.

lenders.name: Corey
lenders.loan_because: I want to support women making a difference in the world, as they embody the feminine principle of nurturing and receptivity.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach astrology as a self-awareness tool and  love to support people and organizations in transition.

lenders.name: Everett
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone with my money.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a TV News Photographer at a local TV station in Denver Colorado

lenders.name: MrsA
lenders.loan_because: There is no greater dignity than that of one who possesses self reliance.  Enabling people in poorer nations to pull themselves up 'by the boot straps' allows them that dignity.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: Je peux/I can.

lenders.name: Gunnar
lenders.loan_because: People that dont have enough money should have a chance to do what makes them happy and makes them and their families a living.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is pretty simple. I go to school every day and learn stuff.

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: the least I can do, and it empowers people!
lenders.occupational_info: Involved in drug safety research studies.

lenders.name: JamesFord
lenders.loan_because: I love to invest.
lenders.occupational_info: Every Saturday I play hockey.

lenders.name: Anita
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in as many people's lives as I'm capable of.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a DSP (direct support professional) in a group home supporting 4 individuals with disabilities, helping them lead a life as normal as possible, integrated into the community. I'm also an Entrepreneur.

lenders.name: Kaizad
lenders.loan_because: it helps.

lenders.name: bailey
lenders.loan_because: this is the way i can give back to the world for so much it has given me.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an average human being, out so make something of myself.  Not many people do anything to make a difference. So We have to make up for them.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others create a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Catholic Christian minister on a university campus in the midwestern United States.

lenders.name: The Nelsons
lenders.occupation: Public Servant, Educator, Non-Profit Mngt, Student
lenders.loan_because: our daughter gave us a KIVA loan for Christmas so we could start lending together. She believes so much in microfinance and  wanted us as a family to see the impact we could make together.
lenders.occupational_info: Dad works with the Police Department managing property. Mom educates junior highers (she's a saint), Sarah works with a local non profit and Daniel is a full time student looking forward to changing the world.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to help, so why not.
lenders.occupational_info: I evaluate environmental conditions of properties before they are purchased or developed

lenders.name: Faye
lenders.loan_because: After visiting my missionary daughter in Bolivia and Peru, I was amazed at the spirit, love and vitality of the people I met.  They need so little to make such a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I write for an on-line newsletter that keeps people informed regarding the legislation of our state.  I am also involved in local political consulting and campain work.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: A hand up not a hand out.

lenders.name: Karen Anne
lenders.loan_because: I am able to.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: It makes a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I love to share information and help people find the information and resources that will improve their lives, and the books and movies that will provide them with entertainment.  Parents - read to your children!  You will open up a whole new world for them.

lenders.name: Joe & Margarita
lenders.loan_because: It is a good thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying finance and hope to become a stock trader in New York City.

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.occupational_info: Corporate problem solving

lenders.name: Deb
lenders.loan_because: Even small acts of support and kindness can make a difference.  I  hope to help women around the world develop businesses, create financial freedom, provide for their families, build self-esteem and become empowered.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a writer and producer of televsion and web projects of all sorts, many are for children.

lenders.name: Eliza
lenders.loan_because: we are all connected, and many people can do many more amazing things with money than I. Travel has given me excitement for learning and partnering across cultures and perspectives. We all have so much to learn and share.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a US based non-profit that develops teaching and learning tools for international education and vocational programs.

lenders.name: Jentry
lenders.loan_because: So little goes so far
lenders.occupational_info: Designing rockets for human space travel

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are helping themselves here via KIVA. I also support children's homes and abuse shelters. I feel very fortunate in my life and want to help others on their way to feeling the same.
lenders.occupational_info: Music Industry-Live performance

lenders.name: Art
lenders.loan_because: It feels good, I can, and it just might make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I get up and go to work 5 days a week then I rest for 2 days and then I get and do it all over again and again and again....  As my out of work friend in Nicaragua says "que galan" or "how nice".

lenders.name: Casey
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people in their careers.

lenders.name: Kelli
lenders.loan_because: I've been fortunate enough to travel to many corners of the world, and I've seen first hand how difficult it can be to work and live in developing countries.  I know that every small gesture can make a BIG difference for those in need, and until I can do more, I'm so happy I can help in this way.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I like to see people achieve their business goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I write programs for computers.

lenders.name: Mary Anne & Wilfried
lenders.loan_because: It is so easy ...

lenders.name: Shahzad
lenders.loan_because:
I want people to get on their feet and be able to support themselves.

I always want people be able to self-sustain so that they do not have to spread their hand and hurt their self-respect.

We Kiva Muslim group should have a common strategy to loaning funds.
lenders.occupational_info: I own couple of businesses and Alhumdolillah am doing good.

lenders.name: Davey Coalition
lenders.loan_because: We loan instead of giving Christmas gifts.  We felt it was a more meaningful use of our money.
lenders.occupational_info: 2 teachers, 1 retired teacher, 1 social worker, 1 police officer, 1 fire fighter, and one retired homemaker

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I can and hopefully it will make the world a little bit better.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find and purchase homes.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: It will make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher of third grade students who are 8 and 9 years old.

lenders.name: Rose Anne
lenders.loan_because: I think it is great to support someone in their choices and perhaps even help them fulfill their dreams. At the same time, I find it very inspiring to see how creative people are, in finding ways to make their life sustainable, hopefully by doing something they love.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Guest Relations at Mike Wiegele Helicopter Skiing. Together with all the other staff I try to exceed guest expectations on their holiday. Quite often this holiday is a reward that someone gives themselves, and sometimes people save money for years in order to make this trip happen.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I want to establish a global community.

lenders.name: Sue & Mary
lenders.loan_because: We belong to a Mother's group that started when our children were young. We have been meeting for close to twenty years, but recently started a Christmas Gift exchange, We are happy to lend as our gift to eachother, hoping to make a difference in other women's lives.

lenders.name: Max and Alison
lenders.loan_because: We were gifted the opportunity to loan, so we're loaning by the generosity of others
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an emergency department helping sick and injured individuals, and my wife teaches children from 1-6th grades.

lenders.name: Ethan
lenders.loan_because: I have a gift certificate

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because:
"It is in giving that we receive."
- St. Francis of Assisi
lenders.occupational_info: I help people apply to university so that they can pursue and education.

lenders.name: Edgar & Sylvia
lenders.loan_because: We believe we can all make a difference and help this world be a better place.  This is a great opportunity to start making a difference.

lenders.name: Ingrid
lenders.loan_because: I feel that my life is blessed in so many ways.  I feel that that some of what I earn must be put back into my global community and my hope is that this small effort make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am very fortunate in my experiences - business analysis, process analysis, process design, training development & delivery, documentation, project management,  Administration, and more.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I have too much.  Others have too little.

lenders.name: Sriram
lenders.loan_because: I want to enable these budding entrepreneur's to earn a sustainable income for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I detect and notify broken software code!!!

lenders.name: Bradley
lenders.loan_because: It provides me the opportunity to help others better themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I build websites for companies allowing them to sell merchandise on the internet.

lenders.name: Fawn
lenders.loan_because: Paying it forward to our fellow brothers and sisters in the one race, the human race.
lenders.occupational_info: I work helping women to feel better about themselves:)

lenders.name: Paul and Doug
lenders.loan_because:
We've been lending for a few years.
It's very rewarding to take money from paid loans and reinvest to help others.
lenders.occupational_info:
Paul greets people and does computer office work for a hospital
Doug works with computer management in a medium sized print shop.

lenders.name: Patricia/Jeff
lenders.occupational_info:
Jeff is a supply teacher
Patricia is a Supervisor of a program for adults with developmental disabilites.

lenders.name: Daniel&Lisabeth
lenders.loan_because: We are all members of "One Human Family"

lenders.name: Teresa
lenders.loan_because: I want to. Not because someone takes it from me (in taxes and gives to their own cause) but I chose to help you.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach. I teach my children and now my grandchildren. I help where I can.

lenders.name: Marit
lenders.loan_because: individuals make a difference.

lenders.name: Ksenia
lenders.loan_because: I find it deeply gratifying to unite with others to help someone. I see Kiva as using capitalism responsibly to improve the quality of life for other hardworking people throughout the world. On a financial level, the small amount I lend does not adversely affect me - it'd be sitting around in my account anyway.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach teenagers, their parents & their community how to improve their health & communication skills. The population consists of recent immigrants to the US.

lenders.name: ANNE
lenders.loan_because: because everyone needs a helping hand and I think this is a fantastic idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in charge of the accounting department for a hospital.  My staff and I ensure the bills get paid and everything is properly accounted for.

lenders.name: Karen & Cory Shepard
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a break at some point in their life.  I LOVE being a part of such a caring/empowering organization.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people with spinal pain and teaching exercises to support their back.

lenders.name: Pella I CRC YACS
lenders.loan_because: We love Jesus, and we want to help other people around the world!
lenders.occupational_info: We're a group of 25 young people and leaders who meet weekly to serve and praise the Lord. YACS stands for Young Adults in Christ's Service.

lenders.name: Pheydra
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I know my money is well invested--going to hardworking individuals who can use it to help themselves.  I feel like I'm really helping out!
lenders.occupational_info: Legal Secretary

lenders.name: Nicole and Rob
lenders.loan_because: we are all ONE

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: I want to do my part to make a small difference in the lives of those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that performs medical laboratory  testing.  I work in the computer department of this company to make sure that our sales force has the information it needs to provide good service to our customers.

lenders.name: Shawn
lenders.loan_because: in helping each other we help ourselves.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward...one never knows when one will need the help of a friend, or a stranger.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in the midst of a career change. I have spent about 30 years in the entertainment business; Rock n Roll concerts, figure skating and gymnastics shows and tours, and some television work. I am transitioning to the field of psychology. I have just finished graduate school and I am working with an under served community in the area I live in.

lenders.name: Thao

lenders.occupational_info: I attend the University of Houston & work at a dentist's office as a receptionist on the days I don't have class.

When I started my business many years ago I was helped by people and realized how important it is to

lenders.name: Jeanne & Gary

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: Money is freedom, and you can't make money without access to money
lenders.occupational_info: I help sell professional services to large corporations.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: It just makes so much sense to do this.

lenders.name: Joe Stehly
lenders.loan_because: our dollar goes so much further in other parts of the world

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: college students are always short on money, but at $25 it just makes sense.

lenders.name: Dave+Jill

lenders.occupational_info: Technology support.

lenders.name: Veronica

lenders.name: Larry

lenders.occupational_info:
I advise clients and (their) health

least risk .

lenders.name: Jenny Poulin
lenders.occupational_info: Jenny: I study the organic chemistry of  works of art and archaeological objects.

lenders.name: Hadiya
lenders.loan_because: If I have the means, whether it is $1 or $500 I will give freely what was once given to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I currently work for my cities public library

lenders.name: Citizen Purple
lenders.loan_because: It creates an economic stimulus from the ground up and empowers people to improve their lives and their community.  The "economy" = the "velocity of money"...  Kiva helps create that velocity.
lenders.occupational_info: Promoting grassroots, sustainable, common sense, non-partisan progress.

lenders.name: GetData
lenders.loan_because: our company loves helping poeple!

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: I feel the money could be used to benfit people that need it more.
lenders.occupational_info: I study graphic design and I am a Wrestler in the making.

lenders.name: stephanie
lenders.loan_because:
It's an easy way to assist and uplift others.
We are here to be of service in any way we can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a small community hospital and I am also a practitioner of energy healing techniques.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people more directly, especially women. Statistics show that when women get the money there's a higher chance it will be used productively and benefit their children. Kiva is a way to connect the world on a personal level.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a Studio Art major at Willamette University

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I have been given so much...

lenders.name: Bonnie
lenders.loan_because: I love people and because microloans work!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a business office assisting the leaders of our company.  I work 9 hours and travel 2 1/2 hours to work, 5 days per week.  I have a family with a husband, 2 adult children and 2 dogs and 2 cats.  I love my days off!

lenders.name: patricia
lenders.loan_because: I'm looking for ways to make small differences in the world
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired, enjoy gardening and being with my family

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: I have personally witnessed the positive impact of microfinance loans on poor communities in Southeast Asia.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in humanitarian aid and specialize in the Southeast Asian Region.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: The kindness of the Cambodian people during my time there has left a lifelong impression. This is but a small way that I can say Thank You.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a software company that provides business solutions to manufacturers to help reduce costs and be more competitive.

lenders.name: Bunco Group Marin
lenders.loan_because: Our Bunco group likes to give back each year.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I want to help the global community.
lenders.occupational_info: I write books for kids.

lenders.name: Jillany
lenders.loan_because: I can only keep what I give away.

lenders.name: Sally G. Cole
lenders.loan_because: Access to capital is empowering. I hope that by helping empower people in their business lives that they'll have more influence to promote transparency, free markets and rule of law in their home countries.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: People trying to get ahead should not have to pay absurd amounts of interest to " Loan sharks"
lenders.occupational_info: Looking after and breeding beef cattle and sheep.

lenders.name: The Najarian Family
lenders.loan_because: A little support can go a long way for those that are willing to work.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I can and I should.

lenders.name: Fabio Rosa
lenders.loan_because:
I believe that, even with this very modest amount of money, I can make a huge impact in the lives of people in the poorest places of the world.
I can become a banker to those people and can monitor their progress. And people in their neighborhoods will see and they will look for micro-loans, and have their own ideas, so I can give them a chance to raise their kids with dignity, send them to school, and live better lives.
And in troubled places like Afghanistan, we marginally increase the chance that peace can prevail, because people will see there is a positive alternative to conflict.
lenders.occupational_info:
I develop information systems (software) at a public company owned by the Federal Government of Brazil. These software supports brazilian public administration. Our government clients are: Ministry of Finance, Ministry of Planning and Budget, Civil Cabinet of Republic Presidency, Ministry of Transportation, Ministry of Communication and Ministry of Education, among others.
I am also involved in labour movement, being a member of a regional trade union of IT workers' board of directors.

lenders.name: IMAGEANGELS
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance is compelling, practical, and is a great step forward in global assistance for those who need funding. Its giving a hand up for those who need it most, and proactively encouraging more entrepreneurs to take the next step to self sufficiency. Microfinance is logical, fast and cost effective. One small loan can make a big difference to a family.
lenders.occupational_info: Art Services

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I want to teach my children about giving and the power of one person to help another person.
lenders.occupational_info: I answer emergency phone calls from people who need help.  I also send the police officers, fire departments, and the ambulances to help them.

lenders.name: Christy
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Karen and Gery
lenders.loan_because: We are blessed and like this opportunity to help individual families improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: We were both career public health professionals.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: Partageons notre richesse avec des gens honnêtes en besoin...GÉNIAL
lenders.occupational_info: Je travaillais en crédit pour une banque québécoise

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: I hope to help motivated people realize their ambition and succeed in their ventures so they can become Kiva lenders too!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large engineering company in Australia.  My team looks after the computer systems on mining, road building and construction projects.

lenders.name: Julius & Hannah's Family

lenders.occupational_info: teaching and calculating reserves for a reinsurance company

lenders.name: L.& B.
lenders.loan_because: We like others smiling as we do!

lenders.name: Ming
lenders.loan_because: it is my way of giving back to the society and helping those who are less privileged than me.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a writer and inventor.

lenders.name: Diana

lenders.name: Louie
lenders.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I believe you always are where you are supposed to be learning what you need to know.  I'd like to be there to help out.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find places to call home.  If you have a roof over your head, and the basics covered, you are able to pay it forward to help others.

lenders.name: barbara
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with the opportunity to be able to help others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Was an elem teacher,  after school director, wheat weaver, apt manager; now retired and a mother, grandmother, wife.

lenders.loan_because: i think micro-finance works and i care. this is much more effective than government programs
lenders.occupational_info: our company is involved in the logistics industry

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: gerard
lenders.loan_because: I believe everybody should be given chances in life

lenders.occupational_info: I will always try to do work helping people. I have had to struggle myself so I know how hard life can be. I don't have a lot but I  want to share what I do have.

lenders.name: Jean
lenders.loan_because: Group of friends who give loans rather than gifts.  We have more than we need and have decided to give to others, rather to ourselves.

lenders.name: Susie

lenders.occupational_info: I work hard, and am prideful and passionate about what I do. My life is fast-paced, and sometimes all I want to do is stop and enjoy some of the many things that fly right by me. I've always wanted to give more than I have, which is a bittersweet attribute.

lenders.name: Pekka
lenders.occupational_info: Medical doctor at Pharmaceutical company, Finland

lenders.name: Aven Christian
lenders.loan_because: I want make a difference in someone else life even in a smallest way possible

lenders.name: Joan

lenders.name: Pekoe
lenders.loan_because: It's Important

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: I have travelled in many parts of the world and found that most people have the same dreams and aspirations for their families as I have for mine. Loaning is a way to assist people who are making a positive contribution to their communities and to their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Our company rents farmland to farmers.

lenders.name: Amelia
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate that Kiva makes it so easy to offer assistance to another person living on the other side of the world.  Through Kiva, I feel connected to others in a very positive way.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office, sitting in front of a computer and keeping things organized.  But my passion is singing and performing in plays.

lenders.loan_because: It's like lending a hand rather than just giving a handout.

lenders.name: Leif and Vikki
lenders.loan_because: We loan because God has called us to be a blessing to others, because it's better to teach a man to fish than to give him a fish, because once upon a time a very dear friend loaned to us to start our business and we're ever so grateful.
lenders.occupational_info:
We own a small tennis court and running track repair business.  
Leif is also a Fire investigator.

lenders.name: Ramir
lenders.occupational_info:
I work with computers for some time. This year I decided to start my own business as a webmaster. 

All my knowledge I have acquired through computer books, and some Internet courses.

I believe that with dedication I'll have success in my business.

lenders.name: 4 Kaps
lenders.loan_because: "You must be the change you wish to see in the world."  ... M.K. Gandhi

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I've been very blessed and I want to share and help people around the world.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I think that we live in a world with enough for everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach langauges.

lenders.name: Melinda & Jeff
lenders.loan_because: it makes us feel good

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of a hand up rather than a handout and I truly value the partnership.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is being in action, providing value and usefulness to others and their families no matter what  I may be doing for work .

lenders.name: Victor
lenders.loan_because: I think that people need to take action to help themselves.  These people are doing that in order to make a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people get mortgages for homes in Canada.  Homes are where life begins and provide safety, comfort and happiness for us.  Most people take this forgranted.  I help people get the best interest rate for a mortgage for their home.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the motivation and enthusiasm in human beings to determine their own destiny.
lenders.occupational_info: I help others by educating patients about their medications and about making their lives healthier.

lenders.name: John & Sandy
lenders.loan_because: We were given a G.C. for Kiva, what a wonderful gift & opportunity!
lenders.occupational_info: Giving is such a wonderful feeling!

lenders.name: mary
lenders.loan_because: My Father is a huge supporter of Kiva. He gave me a gift certificate for Christmas and I think it was one of the most meaningful presents I have ever received. I am very thankful to be a supporter of Kiva now!

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because:
I love to travel, esp third world countries.   
I want to help people that are trying to help themselves.
Sometimes we all need a little bit of help.  I want the world to know not all Americans are focused on themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I currently volunteer for community organizations as I have older family members that I need to take care of ; my children are 23 &24 and do not need Mom to take care of them at this time.

lenders.name: Isabelle
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people get a proper income and show them I care about them.

lenders.name: Roberto
lenders.loan_because: There is a need in this world for people to care a little. Does not matter at what time in life you realized that.  Glad to.
lenders.occupational_info: I drive a state of the art stage coach throught out the US. Specially the east coast.  I meet a lot of people from all walks of life and I love it.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I want others to be able to have a chance to make a living and see their dreams come true.
lenders.occupational_info: I make signs and brochures to help businesses promote themselves and what they are selling.

lenders.name: carl
lenders.loan_because: I love making a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: A labor of love.

lenders.name: orval
lenders.loan_because: I  like  to help ,   makes  me feel good too..

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: This Experience is a gift, and I would like to see more microlending become a part of all cultures.
lenders.occupational_info: I try an live as naturally as I can; I have goats and chickens and love my garden. For  income I take care of other peoples land, work on the river utilizing boating & outdoor education skills.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help others start successful businesses
lenders.occupational_info: my twin sister and I own a children's record label and publishing company

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I like to help others who are trying to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help others to save their money for their future.

lenders.name: Jeanette
lenders.loan_because: We all have a responsibility to help support our fellow neighbors. Although, I am not able to help a great deal -- I like micro lending because in a small way I can help someone deserving. Teach a man to fish and feed him for a lifetime.
lenders.occupational_info: I draw, paint and take pictures for those who like my work.

lenders.name: Garcia
lenders.loan_because: It's my way of apologizing for the u.s.' negative impact on large parts of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: meaningless

lenders.name: Fritz and Kristen
lenders.loan_because: We have been helped by others to achieve our goals.  Now, we have the opportunity to assist someone else achieve their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a doctor for people with kidney problems.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I believe in "paying it forward" and to repay those who took a chance on me.
lenders.occupational_info: Challenging and Fulfilling.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: "We can do no great things only small things with great love" Mother Teresa

lenders.name: David Mazurchi
lenders.loan_because: It's good, simple, fair, and I can.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: Being a self employed small business owner, I am glad to help other people succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a mini donut machine and sell during the outdoor market season from May - October.

lenders.name: Finn
lenders.loan_because: I want to make the world a bit more fair...
lenders.occupational_info: I advise governments on how they can develop a strategy for improving the situation for young people in their country.

lenders.name: Patti & Robert Aguero
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great opportunity for people to make their dreams a reality!
lenders.occupational_info: Housewife and grandmother of two small kids. My husband works out of our home as a private investigator mainly doing work for attorneys.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: You are AMAZING people!  You INSPIRE me. I'm really grateful that Kiva gives me an opportunity to participate as you build your dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I love to make up songs to sing, play and make you laugh.

lenders.name: Deirdre
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Kerey
lenders.loan_because: every action has a reaction
lenders.occupational_info: build and maintain the facilities that produce oil / natural gas.

lenders.name: Human Rights Task Force
lenders.occupational_info: We are the Croton-Harmon High School Human RIghts Task/Action Force.  We're a school club dedicated to social action!

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: I was lucky to grow up in a environment where I did not have to worry about my family's basic needs. I feel I owe others the opportunity to take care of themselves and their families.

lenders.name: BeautyBliss Magazine
lenders.loan_because: "Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything."  George Bernard Shaw
lenders.occupational_info: "The Feel Good Magazine" based in Powell River, BC, meant to inspire people to follow their dreams. Full of "feel good" content only.

lenders.name: Dani
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others who are willing to work for a living.
lenders.occupational_info: I own three restaurants.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I feel very fortunate to live in a country that enables me to own and operate a small business.  We receive help from so many sources...it's nice to be able to help others for a change.

lenders.name: NKU CEO
lenders.loan_because: We want to support and encourage the entrepreneurial spirit wherever it exists. We also want to learn from the ventures of successful entrepreneurs while, hopefully, contributing to their success.
lenders.occupational_info: NKU CEO is a student organization at Northern Kentucky University. It is a branch of CEO, the Collegiate Entrepreneurs’ Organization, and is the premier global entrepreneurship network which serves over 30,000 students at colleges and universities. It's mission is to inform, support, and inspire college students to be entrepreneurial and seek opportunity through enterprise creation.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: Together we can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I keep house for myself and my husband. I garden flowers and herbs.

lenders.name: Hao Nguyen
lenders.loan_because: I believed peoples need a second chance....

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: starting a business is hard work.  Everyone needs a little help now and then!
lenders.occupational_info: I assist brides & grooms achieve their dream wedding.  It's the most rewarding job.

lenders.name: GPrep History Class
lenders.loan_because: We're a global community.

lenders.name: WWEF
lenders.loan_because: Success starts with believing in Your Dream...  Taking the First Step to Achieve It Takes Courage.
lenders.occupational_info: I believe in "Helping Others Who Want to Help Themselves Realize Their Dreams".

lenders.name: Kendall
lenders.loan_because: Even when I've been burned I still have faith in others.  I like to help people that need a helping hand. When I've was down and out people helped me out.  A good friend says that I'm a good person, and would give my last dollar to someone that needed it more than I.  I have faith in others.
lenders.occupational_info: I love dogs, especially my Black Lab and my Harlequin Great Dane. I enjoy anything that can be done outdoors.

lenders.name: HRSentry
lenders.loan_because: We believe in making a difference not only in our local community, but in the community of all people around the globe.
lenders.occupational_info: We are an online service that makes over 9,000 resources available to the user that is responsible for the administration of Human Resources.  WWW.hrsentry.com

lenders.name: Vicki
lenders.loan_because: Everybody needs a little help, now and then, to get over a barrier. People have helped me, and now I can help someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired now, and am fortunate to have some savings and a pension. Not everyone is so lucky.

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other women.

lenders.name: Vincent
lenders.loan_because: i can
lenders.occupational_info: studying

lenders.name: Anthonie
lenders.loan_because: To honor my new grandson Finn. His birth reminded me of just how lucky we are to be Americans, regardless of how our government shames us to the rest of the world.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: It feels good.
lenders.occupational_info: What work?

lenders.name: Glenn
lenders.loan_because: dunna know...I don't do much in terms of charity work but I like the idea of helping people who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I make stuff pretty.

lenders.name: Just Shoot Us
lenders.loan_because: We are also a group of working women, who work to provide food, healthcare and education for our children, many of us thanks to loans that we have recieved. We would like to help provide the same opportunities to our "sisters" across the world!

lenders.name: veronique
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help bring beauty and happiness into to lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: Original Paintings, Illustrations, Art Prints and Paper Goods.I hope to bring Joy, Art and Beauty to your everyday life. I am a force of life avec une joie de vivre.

lenders.name: matt
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I work for Arizona State University Recycling

lenders.name: Jim and Karyn
lenders.loan_because: We want to feel that we're having a direct impact on someone's life. Kiva helps us do that.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur who someone  took a chance on.  I believe capitalism is the best system to spur innovation, improve living standards and promote peaceful exchange.
lenders.occupational_info: Online retail of sporting goods

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be in a position where I am able to help others.  There isn't much that could be more rewarding.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to try and help others to have better health.

lenders.name: Renata
lenders.loan_because: We are all connected and can only succeed together to feel really happy and accomplished
lenders.occupational_info: Pilates helps people concentrate and to feel better mentally and physically and while teaching I'm always learning

lenders.name: Cornelia & Matt
lenders.loan_because: It's important to share when we have so much. And the  entrepreneurs are so inspirational! I am so happy when a loan is repaid and we get a message about what you have done with the money. Congratulations to all our entrepreneurs!
lenders.occupational_info: We have a nonprofit, the Unheard Voices Project, dedicated to telling the stories of workers whose livelihoods are endangered by technological change and globalization. Right now we focus on workers in the US--furniture workers, fishermen, and carnival workers--but we hope to expand to other countries in the future.

lenders.name: michele
lenders.loan_because: I think the microfinancing concept is terrific.

lenders.name: Jeremy
lenders.loan_because: I grew up in Madagascar, and I have seen the value of small businesses first hand.

lenders.name: Girl Scout Troop
lenders.loan_because: We wanted to reach out to our global community.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: i can.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Logic Micro Loans
lenders.loan_because: We want to connect with people all over the globe.
lenders.occupational_info:
We manage money for business owners just like you!  We invest their extra profits for the future.

We wish you much success and happiness.

lenders.name: Landry Akossehoun
lenders.loan_because: Juste pour aider les femmes à se prendre en charge.
lenders.occupational_info: Je travaille pour une IMF partenaire de Kiva et je m'occupe du SIG

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: i believe that everyone should be given a change to fullfill their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: i'm in my last year of high school.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: As a woman, I have owned my own business for 22 years.  I want to give women across the globe the same independence.
lenders.occupational_info: I own an adoption agency in Indiana and support brave, young women as they place their babies in new loving homes.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I want to return what others have given to me.

lenders.name: Teri Shilling
lenders.loan_because: as a former Peace Corps volunteer, I believe in the micro-loan model.

lenders.name: Jared
lenders.loan_because: it's an easy way to make a difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: Candidate for Master of Science in Transportation at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.
